data.system_settings: Windows 10 Professional (Fall Creators Update), with Google Chrome Version 62.0.3202.94
data.actual_result: Discord opens normally, but its icon from Windows Task Bar is missing.
data.expected_result: Discord opens normally, and you would see the Discord icon in the Windows Task Bar
data.short_description: Discord Icon (in Windows Task Bar) Disappears After Accepting Invite in Browser
data.steps_to_repro: - Close Discord (DO NOT kill it.) - Get an invite  - Paste it in the browser of your choice (Chrome, Firefox, etc)  - Press Enter  - Observe
